svcproc.title: Clutch Switch
svcproc.para: The clutch switch (376) is a N.O. momentary switch, and its contacts are held closed when the clutch pedal is released.

The switch is provided a ground path over circuit 97-GH, through connector (3) on circuit 97-GA from (1091). The clutch switch (376) sends a ground signal by way of circuit 97AH, connector (3) and circuit 97AH to the ECM connector (1091) terminal 2 while the clutch pedal is released.
